commandDescription: Clones an SFDX-Falcon project from a remote Git repository.
gitRemoteUriArgDescription: URI of the Git repository to clone (eg. https://github.com/GitHubUser/my-repository.git)
outputdirFlagDescription: directory to clone the project into
falcondebugFlagDescription: (hidden) Runs this command in debug mode
falcondebugasyncFlagDescription: (hidden) Runs this command in async debug mode
falcondebugextendedFlagDescription: (hidden) Runs this command in extended debug mode
falcondebugerrorsFlagDescription: (hidden) Extended information displayed for uncaught Errors
